text: Clay is an unincorporated community in Adair County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Clay was established in 1894, and remained in operation until 1908. The community most likely was named for its location within Clay Township. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Adair County, Missouri Category:1894 establishments in Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Clay, Missouri
